Hi everyone,

Welcome to my personal website. I am a PhD candidate in Microbiology and Immunology at Dalhousie University who is working under the supervison of [Dr. Morgan Langille](https://morganlangille.com/).



This site is designed to include information on my professional activites and document any useful tutorials I have developed throughout my career as a researcher.
